div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
قل هو اللّه أحد اللّه الصّمد
محمّد رسول اللّه أرسله بالهدى ودين الحق
عبد اللّه هشام أمير المومپپن أصلحه اللّه
هذا ممّا أمر به القاســم بــن عبيــد اللّه
في سنة عشــرة ومائة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
qul huwa ăl lāhu ʾaḥad:un ăl lāhu ăṣ ṣamadu
muḥammad:un rasūlu ăl lāhi ʾarsala hu bi ăl hudà wa dīni ăl ḥaqqi
ʿabdu ăl lāhi hišāmu ʾamīru ăl muʾminīna ʾaṣlaḥa hu ăl lāhu
hāḏā mimmā ʾamara bi hi ăl qāsimu bnu ʿubaydi ăl lāhi
fī sanaẗi *** ʿašaraẗa wa miʾaẗ:in

[Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux !] [In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.]
[Dis: il est Dieu l'un], Dieu l'éternel. [Say, He is one God,] God the Eternal.
[Muḥammad est le Messager d'Allah], il l'a envoyé avec la direction par excellence et la religion vraie. [Muḥammad is the Messenger of God], He has sent him with guidance and true religion.
[Le serviteur de Dieu Hišām, prince] des croyants, que Dieu le garde en bonne santé. [The servant of God Hišâm, Commander] of the Faithful, may God make him vigorous.
[Ceci appartient à ce qu'a ordonné] al-Qāsi[m Ib]n [ʿUbay]d Allāh [This belongs to that, which has been decreed by] al-Qâ[sim ib]n [ʿUbai]dallâh
[en l'an] cent dix-[...] [In the year] one hundred and [x]teen.
